radiographic_examinations.findings: Fundic gland polyposis detected endoscopically, no adenomas/dysplasia or carcinomas were found in the stomach or duodenum.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: High-grade dysplasia detected in a biopsy when the patient was 46 years old, prior imaging showed no dysplasia.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Two large high-grade dysplasia lesions in the gastric body, showing dysplastic epithelium covering non-neoplastic oxyntic glands.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Biopsy showed high-grade dysplasia after previous endoscopy did not indicate any dysplasia or carcinomas.
